body.name: Canon PG-260 XL/CL-261 XL Value Pack, Compatible to TR7020, TS6420, and TS5320 Printers, Multi, Once Size (3706C005)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 22 hrs 31 mins
features: The PG-260 XL Black Ink Cartridge produces crisp, sharp black text for all your documents. The CL-261 XL Color Ink Cartridge produces colorful photos and images.
Combined with Canon photo paper it protects your photos with the ChromaLife100 system for beautiful, long lasting photos.
Genuine XL Canon inks provide peak performance that are specifically designed for compatible Canon printers.
body.description: Genuine XL Canon Inks for sharp black text & great looking photos and images. The PG-260 XL Black Ink Cartridge produces crisp, sharp black text for all your documents. The CL-261 XL Color Ink Cartridge produces colorful photos and images bined with Canon photo paper it protects your photos with the ChromaLife100 system for beautiful, long lasting photos. Genuine XL Canon inks provide peak performance that are specifically designed for compatible Canon printers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Canon is proud of its long and unwavering tradition of protecting and preserving our most precious of resources - the world we share. As a global organization, we at Canon understand our responsibility for the impact we make on society and the environment. That is why, from our founding, Canon's corporate philosophy has been Kyosei - which we define as "all people, regardless of race, religion, or culture, harmoniously living and working together into the future." At every step, we make energy and resource conservation and the elimination of hazardous substances our most important goals. Kyosei also drives our commitment to establishing good relations, not only with our customers but also with the communities in which we operate. Our dedication to Kyosei guides our tradition of commitment to protect and preserve our most precious of resources - the world we share, the communities we serve, and the lives we touch.

reviews.reviewTitle: Canon PG-260 XL/CL-261 XL Value Pack: The Elysium of Printing Excellence!
reviews.reviewText: Ladies and gentlemen, brace yourselves for a review that transcends the ordinary and catapults us into the realm of printing perfection! I present to you the Canon PG-260 XL/CL-261 XL Value Pack—an unrivaled symphony of ink cartridges, meticulously crafted to harmonize with TR7020, TS6420, and TS5320 Printers. This review is not just a testament; it's an epic ode to the very essence of printing excellence!In a world where documents and visuals dance across pages, where ink is the lifeblood of our ideas, and where precision and quality reign supreme, the Canon PG-260 XL/CL-261 XL Value Pack emerges as the undisputed maestro of printing prowess. These ink cartridges are not just tools; they are the guardians of our printed dreams, the sorcerers of clarity, and the architects of perfection.Imagine a world where your printer awakens with a renewed vigor, where every printout emerges as a masterpiece, and where the colors burst forth with a vibrancy that rivals the very tapestry of nature. These ink cartridges are not just vessels of ink; they are the bearers of brilliance, the alchemists of hues, and the conduits of visual splendor.The XL designation is not just a label; it's a promise of longevity. With these cartridges, you are not merely dipping your quill into the inkwell; you are forging a covenant with durability. They stand as a bulwark against the relentless march of time, ensuring that your prints remain vivid and impeccable for epochs to come.Compatibility with TR7020, TS6420, and TS5320 Printers is not just a convenience; it's a stroke of genius. These ink cartridges are not just companions; they are soulmates to your printer, seamlessly integrating to deliver a symphony of perfection with every print. Together, they are an unstoppable force, transforming your printer into a veritable printing deity.And let us not forget the seamless installation—the process is as effortless as a gentle breeze, ensuring that you spend less time fumbling with cartridges and more time basking in the glory of your exquisite prints.In conclusion, the Canon PG-260 XL/CL-261 XL Value Pack is not just a collection of ink cartridges; it's the Elysium of printing excellence, the zenith of precision, and the apex of quality. It has elevated my printing experience to a celestial level, and for that, it deserves nothing less than an epic, over-the-top standing ovation! To the creators of this printing masterpiece, I salute you!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good value. Same brand as original ink combo
reviews.reviewText: The shipping was fast and packaging was proper. I received exactly what I ordered. The installation of the cartridges took 30 seconds. No issues, I will buy this again.
Cartridges are fine. Just overpriced compared to the hp brands I used before

So it’s ink cartridges. Are they exceptional and exciting? No, not really.Do they do what I need and expect them to? Yes, most definitely!I could have bought them anywhere and gotten the same thing.The price was ok. But not a blowout sale, about the same as most places, give or take a few cents.
